mapper.select: select pca.integrationid as integrationId , pca.corporateregistrationnumber__c as cnpj , pca.name as name , pca.corporaterepresentativename__c as nickname , pca.cust_stat_cd__c as accountStatus , pca.situationstatusreason__c as reasonStatus , pca.dealershoptype__c as dealerType , pca.dealercode__c as dealerCode , pca.phone as mainPhone , pca.fax as fax , pca.emailaddress__c as mainEmailAddress , pca.emailaddress__c as workEmailAddress , case when pca.salesflag__c = true then 'Y' when pca.salesflag__c = false then 'N' end salesDealerFlag , case when pca.serviceflag__c = true then 'Y' when pca.serviceflag__c = false then 'N' end serviceDealerFlag , pca.prtnrshp_start_dt__c as partnerStartDate , pca.prtnrshp_end_dt__c as partnerEndDate , pca.region__c as region , pca.businesshours__c as workingHour , pca.facebook__c as facebookPage , pca.website as homepage , pca.billingstreet as streetAddress , pca.billingstreet_2__c as streetAddress2 , pca.billingstreet_3__c as streetAddress3 , pca.billingcountry as county , pca.billingcity as city , pca.billingstate as state , pca.billingcountry as neighborhood , pca.billinglatitude as latitude , pca.billinglongitude as longitude , pca.billingpostalcode as zipCode , pca.dealercode__c as csn , pca.row_id as id , pca.row_id as rowId from process.account pca where pca.cust_stat_cd__c = 'Active' and pca."type" = 'Dealer'

select pcc.integrationid as integrationId , pcc.cpf__c as cpf , pcc.firstname as firstName , pcc.lastname as lastName , pcc.email as emailAddress , pcc.homephone as homePhone , pcc.companyphone__c as workPhone , pcc.mobilephone as cellPhone , pcc.title as jobTitle , pcc.statusdealer__c as status , pcc.note__c as notes , pcc.row_id as id from process.contact pcc where pcc.account_row_id = #{accountRowId}
